mapper.sql: a.id, a.record_id, a.product_id, a.product_stock_id, a.product_bar_code, a.in_huowei_code, a.out_huowei_code, a.batch_no, a.merge_order_no, a.order_no, a.product_num, IFNULL(a.selling_price,0) as sellingPrice, IFNULL(a.purchase_price,0) as purchasePrice, a.product_num * IFNULL(a.purchase_price,0) as inTotalPrice, a.product_num * IFNULL(a.selling_price,0) as outTotalPrice, a.produce_date, a.exp_date, a.package_record_id, a.high_low_supplies, a.import_no, a.supplier_id, a.distributor_id, a.sys_org_code, a.create_by, a.create_time, a.update_by, a.update_time, a.spec_unit_id, a.spec_quantity, a.registration, a.ref_bar_code, a.bar_code_type
b.name AS "unitName"
LEFT JOIN pd_unit b ON c.unit_id = b.id

c.number as "number", c.number as "productNumber", c.name as "productName", c.spec as "spec", c.version as "version", c.jde_code as "jdeCode", c.dart_code as "dartCode", c.registration as "productRegistration"
LEFT JOIN pd_product c ON c.id = a.product_id
e.name AS "venderName", e.jde_code AS "venderJdeCode"
left join pd_vender e on c.vender_id = e.id
d.name AS "supplierName", d.jde_code AS "supplierJdeCode"
left join pd_supplier d on a.supplier_id = d.id

g.submit_date AS "submitDate", g.audit_date AS "auditDate", g.record_type AS "recordType", g.record_no AS "recordNo", g.in_type AS "inType", g.out_type AS "outType", g.remarks as "remarks", (select r.depart_name from sys_depart r where r.id=g.in_depart_id) AS "inDepartName", (select r.depart_name from sys_depart r where r.id=g.out_depart_id) AS "outDepartName"
LEFT JOIN pd_stock_record g ON g.id = a.record_id
h.realname as "realname"
LEFT JOIN sys_user h ON h.id = g.submit_by
j.stock_num as stockNum
LEFT JOIN pd_product_stock j ON j.id = a.product_stock_id AND j.nestat_status = '1'
jj.stock_num as stockNum
LEFT JOIN pd_product_stock jj ON jj.record_detail_id = a.id AND jj.nestat_status = '1'
k.name as outHuoweiName
LEFT JOIN pd_goods_allocation k ON k.code = a.out_huowei_code
m.invoice_no as invoiceNo, m.invoice_code as invoiceCode, m.invoice_data as invoiceData
LEFT JOIN pd_invoice_detail l ON l.bill_detail_id = a.id LEFT JOIN pd_invoice m ON m.id = l.invoice_id
n.name AS "distributorName"
left join pd_distributor n on a.distributor_id = n.id
mapper.update: UPDATE pd_stock_record_detail SET del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_DELETE}, update_time =#{updateTime}, update_by =#{updateBy} where record_id = #{recordId}
